TopicTitle: Kerbal Minds Corp. New Logo Contest!

Articles.Content:
It has been a LONG while since I have added a logo... I have one and am very grateful to have one.... But I would like to update it. I would like to see what the community can again do to design for our image... Since our first logo is perfect for example, if you would like to see our style, then go here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74507-Kerbal-Minds-Corp-Crafts%21-HIRING%21-TAKING-REQUESTS

I'll choose the too three and put them in the op if you make it . ALSO, I would like a signature so the top three best also gets listed....

Also, I would like an anthem for us!! So if you can make it, then it's unlikely I WON'T take it. unless there is competition.

Top Three Logo Designers:

-

-

Updated as of 6/28/14

Edited June 28, 2014 by ZooNamedGames
*added the fact I want someone to make an anthem
Nobody wants to try?
Still no applicants?

I might want to make something over the next week or two.

I feel qualified for both of your requests, though only barely.

I might want to make something over the next week or two.

I feel qualified for both of your requests, though only barely.

Both being which of the three?
I will try to create a logo in vector art this week.
Alright. So far, neither of you will have much competition..l
...still no more applicants?
Alright then... Wait for the others to post, then close this...
Any last submissions???
Oh I give...

The Kerbal Minds Corp. is a really great group, but almost no one has probably heard of them over here in the Fan Works section. So don't worry about any lack of interest in this section of the forum.

I'm not entirely sure if I'm up for an anthem, and I'm pretty sure the old KMC image is better, but I spent a little while drawing this. I hope this isn't too far off of what you wanted.

[EDIT: Sorry for the thin black line on the left side of the picture. I'll clean it up with MS paint and repost in a little bit.]

I do like our original logo, it captures our idea very well... But as I said, it's time to move on....

But your logo.... that is.... Amazing. That is one of the best logos someone has made for us, ever. I love Xaelath's. But yours.... I love it too. That is awesome.

With a little cleaning of the colors and the bar you mentioned, it would be an honor to put this on our OP.
I cleaned up the background a bit and removed the bar. I'm so glad that you liked this

I cleaned up the background a bit and removed the bar. I'm so glad that you liked this

http://i.imgur.com/gN5e22T.jpg

Alright. If penguin doesn't do anything soon, I'll just end this

But still, love the logo. Thank you so much.

I may have one, give me a few minutes.

EDIT: Here, like I said I can't make Logos for crap

Edited July 5, 2014 by The Fleet Master
This would be a great thing to put in KMC employees' signatures! Though I don't view it as very "Logo-ish."

This would be a great thing to put in KMC employees' signatures! Though I don't view it as very "Logo-ish."

Both are accepted ! So I'll soon add this to the op for all to see.
So, like the signature and or the new front page? all has been added.
I give up. The previous logos are superior to me.

I give up. The previous logos are superior to me.

Bro. I don't care how bad it is, as long as it isn't a scribble. I'll be happy with it. I'm just glad that you DID try to make me one... So don't give up! Keep trying!
